notes: Only required members are accounted for, other members are ignored
description: A JSON Schema describing a JSON Patch
title: JSON Patch

_88replace.description: replace operation. Value can be any JSON value.

_88copy.description: copy operation. "from" is a JSON Pointer.

_88move.description: move operation. "from" is a JSON Pointer.

_88test.description: test operation. Value can be any JSON value.

$eref.description: add operation. Value can be any JSON value.
